page.title: 07PUBLIC & COMMUNITY SERVICES
page.content: LIBRARY:Market Hse.new premises l985/ 86 in Cantilupe Rd.1 qualified libra- rian,2 assists.Allocation Â£7000pa:pur- chasing > 9000 books.Membership 5516 adults, 1541 children. 18680 books for loan- 3000 childrens, 1125 reference. Magazines,newspapers & directories av- ailable. Supply to playgroups,Books on Wheels operated by Lions Club & WRVS. Mobile Library (allocation Â£7000pa) to within 2 mile radius. FIRE:sited in Gloucs Rd,cover approx 56 sq.ml.4 full &14 part-time officers.2fire & 1 water tender,1landrover;turntable available in Hereford.Av.200calls pa with false alarms.Deal with fires,floods,road acc idents & other. AMBULANCE:planned move to adjoin fire station.Cover6mile radi us:1station officer,9ambulance men on 24hr call.3ambulances-mileage per mnth -700emergencies,1200urgent,3500routine Hospitalcar service to routine clinics
